Package de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio

Class NioNetworkLayer

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio.NioNetworkLayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
NioClientNetworkLayer, NioServerNetworkLayer
public abstract class NioNetworkLayer
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract base class for both NioClientNetworkLayer and NioServerNetworkLayer
Implements core features both NioNetworkLayers need.
Defines constants needed by both NioNetworkLayers.
Author:
Matthias Wagner

  • Constructor Details

    • NioNetworkLayer

      NioNetworkLayer​(Game game)
      Constructs a new NioNetworkLayer.
      Parameters:
      game - the game providing the messages queue to dispatch notifications on. If 'null' the networking thread is used. Useful to run unit tests without a game instance.
      Warning: Never use 'null' in the main game as blocking the networking thread from a callback function will break the network layer.
